this_title: Mark Hamill's Pop Culture Quest Season 1
trans_title: 马克·汉密尔流行文化大探索 第一季
introduction: Mark Hamill's Pop Culture Quest follows the star of Star Wars and voice of the Joker on a mission to find and meet with collectors of pop culture memorabilia and experience their amazing collections! As a lifelong collector himself, Mark wants to dig deeper and explore the origins of the most fascinating people and objects he runs across on his quest.
chinese_title: 马克·汉密尔流行文化大探索 第一季
foreign_title: Mark Hamill's Pop Culture Quest Season 1
